admin-page.title: Admin
admin-page.description: Manage users, roles, and permissions across your application. 🌴

agenda-view.no-events-description: There are no events scheduled for this time period.

booking-dialog.title: Book appointment
booking-dialog.description: Book an appointment for this date

create-event-dialog.title: Create appointment
create-event-dialog.description: Add a new appointment to your calendar

update-event-dialog.title: Update appointment
update-event-dialog.description: Update an appointment in your calendar

use-book-appointment-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong booking the appointment 😢
use-book-appointment-mutation.profile-incomplete-description: You need to complete your health profile before booking an appointment.

use-cancel-appointment-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong canceling the appointment 😢

use-create-appointment-mutation.error-conflict-message: An appointment already exists for this time. Please try a different one.
use-create-appointment-mutation.error-user-not-found-message: User not found, please try with a different identification number.
use-create-appointment-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong creating the appointment 😢

use-delete-appointment-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong deleting the appointment 😢

use-update-appointment-mutation.error-conflict-message: An appointment already exists for this time. Please try a different one.
use-update-appointment-mutation.error-user-not-found-message: User not found, please try with a different identification number.
use-update-appointment-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong updating the appointment 😢

data-table.empty-message:
No users found in this page. 😢
Try changing the filters or going to the next page

health-profile-form.step-emergency-contacts-description: Who to call in a emergency

personal-info-form.title: Personal Information
personal-info-form.c-sections-label: Have you had any Cesarean Sections?

medical-info-form.title: Medical Information
medical-info-form.allows-transfusions-label: If a blood transfusion is needed, does your creed allow it?
medical-info-form.allergy-details-placeholder: Describe your allergies and any medication you take...
medical-info-form.allergy-details-description: Include triggers, severity, and current treatments if any.
medical-info-form.has-chronic-illness-label: Do you have any chronic illnesses?
medical-info-form.chronic-illness-details-placeholder: List your conditions and current medications...
medical-info-form.chronic-illness-details-description: Include diagnosis names, dates, and treatments if possible.

emergency-contacts-form.title: Emergency Contacts
emergency-contacts-form.home-phone-placeholder: Enter the contact's home phone number
emergency-contacts-form.mobile-phone-placeholder: Enter the contact's mobile phone number
emergency-contacts-form.work-phone-placeholder: Enter the contact's work phone number

forgot-password-form.title: Forgot my password
forgot-password-form.description: Please enter your email address to receive a password reset link 🔒.

recovery-form.title: Recovery code 🔐
recovery-form.description: Enter the code from your recovery codes list. Remember that each code can only be used once.

sign-up-form.title: Sign up
sign-up-form.description: Create your account to get started 🎉

two-factor-form.title: Two-factor authentication 💂
two-factor-form.description: Enter your one-time password to continue.
two-factor-form.recovery-prompt: Don't have access to your authentication app?

use-credentials-mutation.error-email-not-verified-message: Verify your email to sign in 📧
use-credentials-mutation.error-email-not-verified-description: Check your email (or spam folder) for the verification email.

use-forgot-password-mutation.success-toast-description: Check your email (or spam folder) for the password reset link.
use-forgot-password-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong sending the password reset link 😢
use-forgot-password-mutation.error-failed-to-send-reset-password-emai: Failed to send password reset link 😢

use-magic-link-mutation.success-toast-description: Check your email (or spam folder) for the magic link.
use-magic-link-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong sending the magic link 😢
use-magic-link-mutation.error-user-not-found-message: Email not found, please try with a different email.

use-recovery-mutation.info-toast: Please note that each recovery code can only be used once. If you've used all your recovery codes, you can generate new ones in your account settings. If you don't remember your password, this is a good time to reset it.
use-recovery-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong verifying the recovery code 😢

use-reset-password-mutation.success-toast-description: Your password has been reset successfully. Please sign in with your new password.
use-reset-password-mutation.error-invalid-token-description: Please request a new password reset link.
use-reset-password-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong resetting the password 😢

use-sign-up-mutation.success-toast-description: Check your email (or spam folder) for the verification link.
use-sign-up-mutation.error-identification-number-already-take: The identification number is already in use. Please try with a different one.
use-sign-up-mutation.error-user-already-exists-message: An account with that email already exists.
use-sign-up-mutation.error-password-compromised-message: The password is compromised. Please choose a more secure password.
use-sign-up-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong creating the account 😢

use-two-factor-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong verifying the verification code 😢

notifications-sidebar.empty-message: You don't have any notifications yet 😢

use-delete-notification-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong deleting the notification 😢

use-update-notification-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong updating the notification 😢

generate-backup-codes-form.title: Backup codes
generate-backup-codes-form.label: Generate backup codes
generate-backup-codes-form.description: Generate a set of backup codes to use if you lose your authentication app. If you already have backup codes, this will generate a new set and invalidate the previous one.
generate-backup-codes-form.password-description: To generate backup codes, please enter your password.

qr-code-dialog.qr-code-title: Scan the QR in your authentication app
qr-code-dialog.backup-codes-description: Please download your backup codes and store them in a safe place.
qr-code-dialog.qr-code-description: Or enter your secret key manually:
qr-code-dialog.otp-description: Please enter the one-time password from your authentication app.

update-email-form.label: Email
update-email-form.description: This is the email address we'll use to contact you. It will not be publicly visible.

update-identification-number-form.label: Identification number
update-identification-number-form.description: This is your identification number. It will not be publicly visible.

update-language-form.label: Language
update-language-form.description: This is the language the application will be displayed in.

update-name-form.label: Name
update-name-form.description: This is your public name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym.

update-notifications-form.communication-emails-description: Receive emails about your account activity.
update-notifications-form.marketing-emails-description: Receive emails about new products, features, and more.
update-notifications-form.social-emails-description: Receive emails for friend requests, follows, and more.
update-notifications-form.security-emails-description: Receive emails about your account activity and security.
update-notifications-form.mobile-settings-label: Use different settings for my mobile devices
update-notifications-form.mobile-settings-description: You can manage your mobile notifications in the <link>mobile settings</link> page.

update-password-form.title: Change password
update-password-form.new-password-description: If you change your password, all your active sessions will be logged out.
update-password-form.current-password-description: To change your password, please enter your current password.

update-two-factor-form.title: Two-factor authentication
update-two-factor-form.label: Enable 2FA
update-two-factor-form.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account.

use-generate-backup-codes-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong generating backup codes 😢

use-revoke-session-mutation.session-not-found-error: The session you tried to revoke has already been closed 🤓
use-revoke-session-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong revoking the session 😢

use-update-email-mutation.success-toast-description: We've sent a verification email to your new email address. Please check your email (or spam folder) to approve the changes and update it.
use-update-email-mutation.error-user-already-exists-message: An account with that email already exists.
use-update-email-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong updating the email 😢

use-update-identification-number-mutatio.error-toast: Something went wrong updating the identification number 😢

use-update-name-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong updating the name 😢

use-update-password-mutation.password-compromised-error: The password you entered is compromised. Please choose a more secure password.
use-update-password-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong updating the password 😢

use-verify-totp-mutation.error-toast: Something went wrong enabling two-factor authentication 😢
